title: Textile, ca. 1800
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block-printed (madder colors and yellow) and painted (blue) on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 27.5 x 41.5 cm (10 13/16 x 16 5/16 in.)
Repeat H x W (straight): 21.6 x 21.6 cm (8 1/2 x 8 1/2 in.)
description: Stylized carnations and other flowers in shades of red and blue with thin meandering stems on a bright yellow ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1800.
ca. 1800. Medium: cotton
